## dataGridCellTemplate variable

Generates a template for the [DataGridCell](./fast-foundation.datagridcell.md) component using the provided prefix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataGridCellTemplate: FoundationElementTemplate<ViewTemplate<DataGridCell>>
```
